hero.description: Get instant, accurate symptom analysis powered by advanced artificial intelligence. Our system compares your symptoms against thousands of medical conditions to provide personalized insights.

workflow.step2Desc: Choose from body map or search

howItWorks.subtitle: Get from symptoms to solutions in minutes

emergency.title: For Medical Emergencies
emergency.description: Call local emergency services immediately. Do not rely on this tool for emergencies.

disclaimer.note: MediSense AI is an educational tool for health information and guidance. Not a substitute for professional medical diagnosis or treatment.

students.title: Students
students.description: Late-night symptom worries? Get instant guidance without clinic wait times.

parents.title: Parents
parents.description: Concerned about child symptoms? Know urgency levels instantly.

elderly.title: Elderly
elderly.description: Manage chronic conditions with symptom tracking and guidance.

rural.title: Rural Areas
rural.description: Limited healthcare access? Get guidance before distant clinic visits.

cta.title: Ready to Understand Your Symptoms?
cta.description: Get AI-powered health insights in minutes. No registration required.

footer.tagline: Intelligent health guidance powered by AI
footer.disclaimer: Not a substitute for professional medical advice.

guide.title: How to Answer Questions Effectively
guide.point1: Please answer each question as accurately as possible based on your current symptoms.
guide.point2: If you encounter any confusing or out-of-context questions, you can skip them using the 'Skip' button.
guide.point3: You can always go back to edit your answers using the 'Previous' button.
guide.point4: Take your time - there's no rush. Accurate answers lead to better analysis.

mhguide.title: Medical History - Optional but Important
mhguide.point1: This medical history form is completely optional. You can skip it if you prefer.
mhguide.point2: However, providing details will significantly increase the accuracy of our analysis (up to 40%).
mhguide.point3: Your data is secure, encrypted, and will be deleted after analysis.
mhguide.point4: You can add custom chronic conditions not listed in the predefined options.

mhformSections.customConditionNote: Add conditions not listed above (e.g., specific rare diseases)

symptomDashboard.title: Symptom Checker
symptomDashboard.generalSymptomsDesc: Add symptoms that affect your whole body or don't have a specific location
symptomDashboard.noSymptomsFound: No symptoms found. Try a different search or category.
symptomDashboard.customSymptomDesc: Can't find your symptom? Add a custom one with your own description and measurement scale.
symptomDashboard.symptomNamePlaceholder: e.g., Unusual Tingling, Specific Pain, etc.
symptomDashboard.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your symptom in detail. What does it feel like? When does it occur?
symptomDashboard.customUnitPlaceholder: e.g., times per day, level, intensity
symptomDashboard.duration: Duration: How long have you had this symptom?
symptomDashboard.notesPlaceholder: Describe your symptom in detail, any triggers, patterns, or other relevant information...
symptomDashboard.noSymptomsAddedDesc: Click on body parts or add general symptoms
symptomDashboard.workflowStep1: Select Body Part: Click on the interactive body map
symptomDashboard.workflowStep2: Choose Symptom: Select specific symptom from list or add custom symptom
symptomDashboard.workflowStep3: Add Details: Specify duration, severity, and notes
symptomDashboard.workflowStep4: Review & Analyze: Submit for AI-powered analysis

medicalHistory.title: Medical Context (Optional)
medicalHistory.description: Providing this information helps improve accuracy by up to 40%, but it's completely optional and not stored permanently.
medicalHistory.privacyNotice: This information is NOT stored and only used for this analysis session.

results.title: AI Analysis Results

disclaimer.title: Important Medical Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: This AI analysis is for informational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.

results.traditionalDisclaimer: Traditional medicines should be prescribed by qualified practitioners. This information is for educational purposes only.
results.traditionalSystem: Traditional Chinese Medicine and Sasang Medicine are holistic systems that consider individual constitution and pattern diagnosis. Consultation with a qualified practitioner is essential for proper diagnosis and treatment.
results.shareResults: Share these results with your doctor for proper diagnosis
results.keepTrack: Keep track of changes and new symptoms
results.consultPractitioners: Consult with certified TCM or Sasang practitioners
results.defaultDescription: Condition based on symptom pattern analysis
results.exportDisclaimer: AI-generated analysis for informational purposes only
results.noConditions: No conditions found for the selected symptoms
